Search resumes for man swept off Ninepin Rock in Auckland’s Manukau Harbour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-resumes-for-man-swept-off-ninepin-rock-in-aucklands-manukau-harbour/KUOPARRIYBALFHRZL6U3MVAERY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-resumes-for-man-swept-off-ninepin-rock-in-aucklands-manukau-harbour/KUOPARRIYBALFHRZL6U3MVAERY/ It has been 36 hours since the man was swept off the rocks while collecting shellfish. Sun, 15 Sep 2024 01:15:07 +0000 The Coastguard Auckland Air patrol deployed its plane this morning to search for the man, who has been missing since just before midnight on Friday.
